MadScienceMod:AcidSpray.NAME: Acid Spray
MadScienceMod:AcidSpray.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy; or deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

MadScienceMod:AntimatterBomb.NAME: Antimatter Bomb
MadScienceMod:AntimatterBomb.DESCRIPTION: Apply a Bomb that deals !M! damage in 3 turns.

MadScienceMod:Assemble.NAME: Assemble
MadScienceMod:Assemble.DESCRIPTION: Assemble a Trinket out of !M! parts. NL Shuffle X copies of it into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select trinket parts to fuse together into a single card.

MadScienceMod:AssemblyLine.NAME: Assembly Line
MadScienceMod:AssemblyLine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn choose and shuffle a Trinket into your draw pile.

MadScienceMod:AutoStrike.NAME: Auto-Strike
MadScienceMod:AutoStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When drawn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

MadScienceMod:Automate.NAME: Automate
MadScienceMod:Automate.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you play a card, spend 1 Fuel to play it twice.

MadScienceMod:Bayonet.NAME: Bayonet
MadScienceMod:Bayonet.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Deal !D! damage; or spend 2 Fuel to deal !D! damage !M! times.

MadScienceMod:BandageBot.NAME: Bandage Bot
MadScienceMod:BandageBot.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take attack damage, shuffle a Tasty Trinket into your draw pile.

MadScienceMod:Bombardment.NAME: Bombardment
MadScienceMod:Bombardment.DESCRIPTION: Apply a Bomb to ALL enemies that deals !M! damage in 3 turns, and again in 6 turns. Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:Booster.NAME: Booster
MadScienceMod:Booster.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Fuel. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:BoxOfScraps.NAME: Box of Scraps
MadScienceMod:BoxOfScraps.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Shuffle up to !M! Trinkets into your draw pile.

MadScienceMod:CaptureMomentum.NAME: Capture Momentum
MadScienceMod:CaptureMomentum.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever an attack would deal damage, instead apply a Bomb that deals double that damage in 3 turns.
MadScienceMod:CaptureMomentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever an attack would deal damage, instead apply a Bomb that deals triple that damage in 3 turns.

MadScienceMod:DEPRECATED_ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
MadScienceMod:DEPRECATED_ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Spend !M! Fuel to gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

MadScienceMod:ClockworkAssistant.NAME: Clockwork Assistant
MadScienceMod:ClockworkAssistant.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a card and play it.

MadScienceMod:CloneVats.NAME: Clone Vats
MadScienceMod:CloneVats.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may copy a card in your hand.

MadScienceMod:ComputeTrajectory.NAME: Compute Trajectory
MadScienceMod:ComputeTrajectory.DESCRIPTION: Move any number of cards from your draw pile to your discard pile.

MadScienceMod:CondenseVapors.NAME: Condense Vapors
MadScienceMod:CondenseVapors.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. NL Obtain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:DataRecorder.NAME: Data Recorder
MadScienceMod:DataRecorder.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Strength, gain 1 Strength.

MadScienceMod:Detonate.NAME: Detonate
MadScienceMod:Detonate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Detonate enemy's Bombs.
MadScienceMod:Detonate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage equal to the enemy's Bombs.

MadScienceMod:DiscountBin.NAME: Discount Bin
MadScienceMod:DiscountBin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! cards in a turn, draw a card.

MadScienceMod:DEPRECATED_EmergencyRepair.NAME: Emergency Repair
MadScienceMod:DEPRECATED_EmergencyRepair.DESCRIPTION: Restore all HP lost last turn. Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:EnergyBarrier.NAME: Energy Barrier
MadScienceMod:EnergyBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for each Fuel you have.

MadScienceMod:ExhaustVents.NAME: Exhaust Vents
MadScienceMod:ExhaustVents.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend Fuel, apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

MadScienceMod:ExploreOptions.NAME: Explore Options
MadScienceMod:ExploreOptions.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When drawn gain !B! Block.

MadScienceMod:ExtractOil.NAME: Extract Oil
MadScienceMod:ExtractOil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This turn, when you play an Attack, gain 1 Fuel.

MadScienceMod:FlammableWall.NAME: Flammable Wall
MadScienceMod:FlammableWall.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Spend 1 Fuel to gain !B! Block; or gain !M! Fuel.

MadScienceMod:FlameCannon.NAME: Flame Cannon
MadScienceMod:FlameCannon.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

MadScienceMod:FlameThrower.NAME: Flame Thrower
MadScienceMod:FlameThrower.DESCRIPTION: Spend all Fuel. NL Deal !D! damage for each Fuel spent.

MadScienceMod:FlexibleSpear.NAME: Flexible Spear
MadScienceMod:FlexibleSpear.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Deal !D! damage, apply !M! Weak; or deal !D! damage, apply !M! Vulnerable.

MadScienceMod:FragmentationGrenade.NAME: Fragmentation Grenade
MadScienceMod:FragmentationGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Shuffle !M! random Trinkets into your draw pile.
MadScienceMod:FragmentationGrenade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Shuffle !M! random upgraded Trinkets into your draw pile.

MadScienceMod:FumeBlast.NAME: Fume Blast
MadScienceMod:FumeBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Costs 1 less for each Fuel spent this combat.

MadScienceMod:FumeHood.NAME: Fume Hood
MadScienceMod:FumeHood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, gain 1 Fuel.

MadScienceMod:DEPRECATED_GarbageDisposal.NAME: Garbage Disposal
MadScienceMod:DEPRECATED_GarbageDisposal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

MadScienceMod:GatherParts.NAME: Gather Parts
MadScienceMod:GatherParts.DESCRIPTION: Draw all Trinkets from your draw pile. NL Shuffle up to !M! Trinkets into your draw pile. Exhaust.
MadScienceMod:GatherParts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw all Trinkets from your draw pile. NL Shuffle up to !M! Trinkets into your draw pile.

MadScienceMod:Generator.NAME: Generator
MadScienceMod:Generator.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, spend 1 Fuel to gain [E].
MadScienceMod:Generator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, spend 1 Fuel to gain [E].

MadScienceMod:GattlingGun.NAME: Plasma Rifle
MadScienceMod:GattlingGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Fuel you have.

MadScienceMod:GlassCannon.NAME: Glass Cannon
MadScienceMod:GlassCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. When drawn increase this card's number of attacks. Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:GoldenGun.NAME: Golden Gun
MadScienceMod:GoldenGun.DESCRIPTION: Spend !M! gold. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

MadScienceMod:HideBehindJunk.NAME: Hide Behind Junk
MadScienceMod:HideBehindJunk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose and shuffle a Trinket into your draw pile.
MadScienceMod:HideBehindJunk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle up to !M! Trinkets into your draw pile.

MadScienceMod:ImposingConstruct.NAME: Imposing Construct
MadScienceMod:ImposingConstruct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When drawn apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

MadScienceMod:Jetpack.NAME: Jetpack
MadScienceMod:Jetpack.DESCRIPTION: Spent 1 Fuel at the start of each turn. Reduce incoming damage by 50%.

MadScienceMod:JunkLaser.NAME: Junk Laser
MadScienceMod:JunkLaser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals an additional !M! damage for ALL of your 0 cost cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Counts 0 cost cards in your draw pile, discard pile and hand.

MadScienceMod:LabAccident.NAME: Lab Accident
MadScienceMod:LabAccident.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand. Add !M! random cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.
MadScienceMod:LabAccident.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand. Add !M! random upgraded cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:LightOnFire.NAME: LightOnFire
MadScienceMod:LightOnFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This turn, whenever you spend Fuel deal !M! damage.
MadScienceMod:LightOnFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This and next turn, whenever you spend Fuel deal !M! damage.

MadScienceMod:Liquify.NAME: Liquify
MadScienceMod:Liquify.DESCRIPTION: Choose and Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand, gain 1 Fuel for each card exhausted. NL Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:MakeOrBreak.NAME: Make or Break
MadScienceMod:MakeOrBreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Choose: Draw !M! cards; or draw !M! cards next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Draw !M! cards next turn.

MadScienceMod:MechanicalClaw.NAME: Prosthetic Claw
MadScienceMod:MechanicalClaw.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. Deal !D! damage. Draw a card.

MadScienceMod:MechanicalSnecko.NAME: Mechanical Snecko
MadScienceMod:MechanicalSnecko.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 2 cards in a turn, draw a card and randomize the cost of cards in your hand for this turn.

MadScienceMod:Mechanize.NAME: Mechanize
MadScienceMod:Mechanize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Fuel. Cards in your hand cost Fuel instead of energy this turn until played.

MadScienceMod:MinatureWeapons.NAME: Minature Weapons
MadScienceMod:MinatureWeapons.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Whenever you play a Trinket, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies; or whenever you play a Trinket, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Trinket, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.
Whenever you play a Trinket, gain !M! Block.

MadScienceMod:MindControlBeam.NAME: Mind Control Beam
MadScienceMod:MindControlBeam.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. Enemy changes their intent.

MadScienceMod:NowOrNever.NAME: Now or Never
MadScienceMod:NowOrNever.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Gain !B! Block; or gain !M! Block next turn.

MadScienceMod:OmniHammer.NAME: Omni-Hammer
MadScienceMod:OmniHammer.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times; or gain !B! Block X times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

MadScienceMod:ParticleBeam.NAME: Particle Beam
MadScienceMod:ParticleBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When drawn, reduce this card's cost by 1 for this combat.

MadScienceMod:Browse.NAME: Browse
MadScienceMod:Browse.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

MadScienceMod:SpamFilter.NAME: Spam Filter
MadScienceMod:SpamFilter.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, put up to !M! cards from your draw pile into your discard pile.

MadScienceMod:PneumaticHammer.NAME: PneumaticHammer
MadScienceMod:PneumaticHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Fuel X times. Gain X Fuel.
MadScienceMod:PneumaticHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Fuel X+1 times. Gain X+1 Fuel.

MadScienceMod:Poke.NAME: Poke
MadScienceMod:Poke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw cards until you draw a 0 cost card, discard the others.

MadScienceMod:PortablePumpjack.NAME: Portable Pumpjack
MadScienceMod:PortablePumpjack.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain !M! Fuel.

MadScienceMod:Postpone.NAME: Postpone
MadScienceMod:Postpone.DESCRIPTION: Place this and any cards from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL When drawn, draw !M! card.
MadScienceMod:Postpone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place this and any cards from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL When drawn, draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose cards to place on top of your draw pile.

MadScienceMod:PowerArmor.NAME: Power Armor
MadScienceMod:PowerArmor.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 3 Fuel, gain !M! Block.

MadScienceMod:PoweredStrike.NAME: Powered Strike
MadScienceMod:PoweredStrike.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you have no Fuel, gain 1 Fuel instead.

MadScienceMod:Probe.NAME: Probe
MadScienceMod:Probe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. You may discard and upgrade any of them.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose cards to discard and upgrade.

MadScienceMod:Reconstitute.NAME: Reconstitute
MadScienceMod:Reconstitute.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn gain !M! Fuel for each Fuel spent this turn.
MadScienceMod:Reconstitute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Fuel for each Fuel spent this turn.

MadScienceMod:RecyclingStation.NAME: Recycling Station
MadScienceMod:RecyclingStation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Trinket, draw a card.
MadScienceMod:RecyclingStation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! random Trinkets into your draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a Trinket, draw a card.

MadScienceMod:Redesign.NAME: Redesign
MadScienceMod:Redesign.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand and discard them. Draw !M! cards.

MadScienceMod:Retarget.NAME: Retarget
MadScienceMod:Retarget.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Strength. NL Gain 2 Thorns for each Attack card in your hand.

MadScienceMod:Refuel.NAME: Refuel
MadScienceMod:Refuel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Fuel. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

MadScienceMod:SelfDestruct.NAME: Self Destruct
MadScienceMod:SelfDestruct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to yourself, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:ShrinkRay.NAME: Shrink Ray
MadScienceMod:ShrinkRay.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength, it regains 1 Strength per turn. Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:SoftenUp.NAME: Soften Up
MadScienceMod:SoftenUp.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. Deal !D! damage. Your next attack this turn deals double damage.

MadScienceMod:Sprocket.NAME: Sprocket
MadScienceMod:Sprocket.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. Exhaust. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

MadScienceMod:StickSharpener.NAME: Stick Sharpener
MadScienceMod:StickSharpener.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw, if you have drawn more than 5, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

MadScienceMod:Strafe.NAME: Strafe
MadScienceMod:Strafe.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Fuel. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

MadScienceMod:ThrowScraps.NAME: Throw Scraps
MadScienceMod:ThrowScraps.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, shuffle a random Trinket into your draw pile.

MadScienceMod:TimeDilationField.NAME: Time Dilation Field
MadScienceMod:TimeDilationField.DESCRIPTION: Apply Slow to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:Tinker.NAME: Tinker
MadScienceMod:Tinker.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and upgrade it.
MadScienceMod:Tinker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and upgrade it. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

MadScienceMod:Tune.NAME: Tune
MadScienceMod:Tune.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Gain !M! Strength and lose !M! Dexterity; or gain !M! Dexterity and lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
MadScienceMod:Tune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose: Gain !M! Strength and lose !M! Dexterity; or gain !M! Dexterity and lose !M! Strength.

MadScienceMod:Virus.NAME: Virus
MadScienceMod:Virus.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of Virus cards in your deck. Add a copy of this to your discard pile.
MadScienceMod:Virus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of Virus cards in your deck. Add !M! copies of this to your discard pile.

MadScienceMod:Weaponize.NAME: Weaponize
MadScienceMod:Weaponize.DESCRIPTION: Turn a Skill card in your hand into an Attack that deals !M! damage in addition to its other effects.
MadScienceMod:Weaponize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Turn ALL Skill cards in your hand into Attacks that deal !M! damage in addition to their other effects.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Trinkets to shuffle into your draw pile.

MadScienceMod:ExplosiveTrinket.NAME: Explosive Trinket
MadScienceMod:ExplosiveTrinket.DESCRIPTION: Apply a Bomb that deals !M! damage in 3 turns. NL Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:FoldedTrinket.NAME: Folded Trinket
MadScienceMod:FoldedTrinket.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, discard one of them. NL Exhaust
MadScienceMod:FoldedTrinket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, discard all but one of them. NL Exhaust.

MadScienceMod:RecycledTrinket.NAME: Recycled Trinket
MadScienceMod:RecycledTrinket.DESCRIPTION: Return the top card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
MadScienceMod:RecycledTrinket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
